company.name: Bigger
company.description: Company that provides services for the development of MVPs, scale up and maintenance of web applications, along with Stellar Blockchain solutions.

responsibilities.title: TASKS
tasks: Developed web applications in TypeScript, applying SOLID principles to achieve maintainability, cohesion, and loose coupling.
Created RESTful APIs following hexagonal architecture, using NestJS, TypeORM, and PostgreSQL/MySQL.
Built an SDK to simplify complex Stellar operations.
Integrated Docker for development environments, testing, and auxiliary services.
Implemented authentication with AWS Cognito and image storage in S3.
Integrated Strapi CMS and built UIs with NextJS and Tailwind CSS.
Tested applications using Jest, Cypress, and Playwright.
Refactored a React Native mobile application, reducing bug reports by 25%.
Configured CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions.
Designed an AI agent for SQL queries via chat interface.
Automated processes using Pipedream for internal workflows and marketing tasks.

projects.title: CAR RENTAL
projects.description: Server-Side Rendering CRUD Application that manages the business logic of a car rental system, enabling clients to register users and create vehicle reservations. The application features a clean, maintainable codebase with well-separated modules implemented using the 'Model-View-Controller' design pattern.

image.alt: Home page of the Car Rental project

projects.title: CLASSROOM PLATFORM
projects.description: Courses platform with <0>Cognito auth</0> and <1>S3 storage</1>. Features role-based management with <2>CASL abilities</2> and <3>Stellar Blockchain</3> payments. The backend implements a <4>RESTful API</4> following <5>hexagonal architecture</5> principles, with <6>HATEOAS</6>-formatted responses and pagination. The frontend will be built with Vite, React and Tailwind CSS.

image.alt: Home page of the Classroom Platform project

projects.title: CRUD Clubs
projects.description: Football club manager with React frontend and RESTful API backend. Supports CRUD operations for English teams, featuring detailed views, data persistence, and a modular architecture. Built with React, Node.js, and Express.
